programme.title: Battle Tour - EastvsWest S1 Ep13
programme.desc: It is more than just a food and travel show as it is a cultural journey. The program blends travel, cuisine, and culture, inviting viewers not only to taste but also to experience the stories, people, and places behind Taiwanese food and destinations. Through lively food challenges, scenic explorations, and authentic local encounters, the hosts bring audiences closer to Taiwans diverse flavors and vibrant traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour S1 Ep137
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz S1 Ep1108
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz S1 Ep1109
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World S1 Ep806
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player S1 Ep580
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Rainy Night Flower S1 Ep13
programme.desc: After leaving reformatory, Xin Xiong joins a gang to make a living and soon he becomes a leader of the gang. He takes protection fees from vendors and works hard to 'maintain the local order' in his way. He has thus developed a very good relationship with the law enforcement unit. Later, a teahouse owner Gui Zhu has fallen in love with Xin Xiong who loves Yue Gui. The triangle relationship is entangled with jealousy.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Song Of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Battle of the Wolf
programme.desc: On his flight home, former special forces sergeant Zhang Zhi Yong and his wife find themselves caught in a terrorist conspiracy masterminded by international criminals. Drawing on his unwavering courage and tactical expertise, he protects his wife and fellow passengers while dismantling the deadly plot and ensuring everyone's safe return home.

programme.title: Prosecutor, The
programme.desc: Based on a true case, young Ma Jia Jie pleads guilty to drug trafficking in exchange for a lighter sentence, as coerced by his defense lawyer. Huo Zi Hao, a former cop turned prosecutor, believes in his innocence and launches an investigation. Risking his life and career, Huo is determined to uncover the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: To Live and Die in Mongkok
programme.desc: Fai (Nick Cheung), a legendary triad figure, was convicted and sent to prison for slaughtering a bunch of people. 30 years later, with the help of a social worker (Chan Lai Wan), Fai release from prison, the city of Mongkok has totally changed and he has almost forgotten his way back home. Disoriented and trapped in the notorious town of vices, Fai must find his way out of a life with a mother suffering from Alzheimer's disease (Paw Hee Ching), a hooker girlfriend (Mo Xiaoqi) with her mentally-challenged younger sister (Natalie Meng), and a malicious cop (Liu Kai Chi) hot on his tail.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: All U Need Is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Shining For One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Cham and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Cham's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brother's hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, a white woman is murdered in Chinatown, and a Chinese man becomes the prime suspect. The crime sparks public outcry to shut down the district. Amid growing unrest, two Chinese detectives, Qin Fu and Ah Gui, race against time to uncover the true killer before prejudice and danger consume their community.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Xiao Fei is a cheerful girl who has been abandoned by her mother. One day, she encounters a gifted young man named Zi Wai, who is battling a rare disease. Determined to help him, she embarks on a journey to find his lost love. Even when they discover that the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: The Calling Of A Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend's wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge - will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Gangster Chen Da Qi rises to the upper echelons of power, but finds himself torn between the love of two women, the murderous plots of the secret service, and the looming threat of war.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang's first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt's puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhen's childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, the third disciple of the Imperial Astronomer, was once a golden boy. However, since the birth of Xu Qi An, his glory has waned. His relentless pursuit cannot defy a merciless truth: all has been foretold. Yet rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Oversteer
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story, the film follows Feng, a determined young man who defies his father to pursue his dream of becoming an automotive mechanic. Alongside his childhood friend Yun, he embarks on a daring journey that unexpectedly plunges them into the exhilarating world of racing, sparking a passionate coming-of-age adventure.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: Washed-up stunt director Li Sen is offered the role of action choreographer on his director friend's final film. Bringing along an ambitious young stuntman, the two generations risk everything to stage a comeback. As Li Sen battles his fierce temper and past mistakes, he also strives to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family's objection, so Hong's maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent's son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan's elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong's enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and guarded by top martial arts masters. Two powerful patriots need to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his family's declining status. Lin visits his fiance before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin's bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord's home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists' cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house's owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police's son, blames his father for his mother's death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father's death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.desc: Honey, Bunny and the gang engage in an exciting game of football.

programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak's struggle and leaves. programme.desc: Heart Breaker, Money Makers - With Fite Nite looming, Inspector Jarvis sends the officers of 15 Division to seize all "proceeds of crime" -anything purchased with money earned illegally. But when Andy and Nick's seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who's lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Escape - After a prison transport van overturns, Hondo and the team hunt down three female fugitives, including a serial killer on the verge of a rampage. Also, with Annie's return to work, Deacon struggles to maintain a work life balance, and Luca does his best to teach Kelly to drive.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Spill The Tea - When a high-value bioweapons expert is murdered in a secure facility on Hawai'i, NCIS and the NCIS Elite team join forces to track down the killer and discover an even deadlier threat.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep12
programme.desc: Without Fear or Favor - Danny joins forces with British investigator Christopher Granger (Jake Weber) to pursue a deadly international fugitive, and Erin faces pressure from her boss, D.A. Crawford (Roslyn Ruff), to secure an indictment against an officer. Also, Jamie investigates a sports gambling website accused of scamming its users, and Frank clashes with Mayor Chase (Dylan Walsh) when the mayor uses his authority to have a retired cop released from jail.

programme.title: LONG BRIGHT RIVER S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Let Me In - Mickey grapples with her guilt about her missing sister as questions mount surrounding the murdered women. Truman connects Mickey to a new suspect in the case and Mickey takes drastic measures to keep Thomas at his private school.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Divided We Conquer - Following a devastating ambush with a deadly bioweapon, the NCIS team must track down a mysterious terrorist group before they can strike again.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Delusions Of Grandeur - Amy grapples with having memories while treating a mother-to-be with a mysterious condition. Also, Dr. Joan Ridley, Amy's mentor, visits Westside.

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED S6 Ep19
programme.desc: Starman - The Fugitive Task Force investigates the kidnapping of a high-profile astronaut in connection with other disappearances in the area, landing them in the wild world of adult content creators. Meanwhile, Remy and Abby struggle to see eye to eye.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Wanting - When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out. As the murderer zeroes in on the one witness who can tie him to the crime, Andy and her rookie, Duncan, are put to a life-and-death test of true police heroism.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S7 Ep7
programme.desc: Last Call - After the shocking shooting of a member of 20-Squad, Hondo and the team launch a citywide manhunt for the robbery crew responsible. Meanwhile, Deacon's plans for his future hit a snag, and Powell and Alfaro clash over a tricky issue.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Behind the Veil - When a bombing at a local restaurant leaves several injured or dead, including a congresswoman and someone close to Isobel, the team races to apprehend the suspect before another explosive goes off.

programme.title: ZOMBIELAND
programme.desc: In a world overrun by zombies, Tallahassee (Woody Harrelson) has found his life's calling slaying the undead. Fearful Columbus (Jesse Eisenberg) however, has survived using the cower-and-run approach. So when these two opposites team up, they're not sure which is worse: falling to zombies or relying on each other.

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Girlboss, Interrupted - The island gives single mom Courtney the ability to read minds in order to impress her charismatic boss, Roarke is worried that Ruby is becoming more and more distant and enlists Javier to help.

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep13
programme.desc: MJ Akuda & The 1st, 2nd, And 3rd Wives Club - Sue, Jenna and Brooklyn are the first, second and third wives of Gavin, a charming doctor who broke all of their hearts, Roarke brings Ruby's youngest daughter, MJ, to the island to help Ruby remember who she is.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep9
programme.desc: Moving Day - 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, "Moving Day", to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that's being torn down. But when Andy and Chloe discover a severely beaten man in a vacant unit, their investigation unearths a ruthless criminal operation that's bigger than they could have ever imagined.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Fragments - Andy's former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile -something she's not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage. With the city under threat, the officers of 15 Division must work frantically to figure out the source of the threats, and stop the suspect before more innocent people get hurt.

programme.title: KING KONG
programme.desc: Oscar winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep3
programme.desc: History - A body found on the Boston wharf pulls Lena and Danny into a tense drug investigation alongside Lena's former partner, Detective Brian Rodgers (Ryan Broussard), sparking personal and professional friction. Jonah and Sean chase down a missing man tied to a scavenger hunt, while Sarah and Mae navigate emotional challenges at home and in court.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jake - When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case. Tess continues to resist the traditional sight impaired training offered by her vision loss consultant Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan), preferring to rely on Sunny's (Agam Darshi) remote guidance - until an unexpected crisis and a nudge from Matt (Jarod Joseph) forces her to reconsider. Meanwhile, Sunny is served divorce papers after failing to meet her husband for a date, leaving her concierge, Kye (Ennis Esmer), as her only real-life contact with the outside world.

programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Taipei (Part 1) - Join Cyril on a journey of self-discovery in various locations across Asia as he shares the marvels of his magic.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE S8 Ep2
programme.desc: Fast Andy - John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Delusions Of Grandeur - Amy grapples with having memories while treating a mother-to-be with a mysterious condition. Also, Dr. Joan Ridley, Amy's mentor, visits Westside.

programme.title: OBLIVION
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman star in this groundbreaking event about a lone repairmen on a near-ruined future Earth who finds himself questioning all he knows in a fight to save humanity.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jake - When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case. programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rites Of Passage - As the Silver family observes Yahrzeit to honor patriarch Ben Silver on the one-year anniversary of his death, Lena and Danny investigate the murder of a beloved shop owner. Meanwhile, Sarah responds to a hostage crisis and Mae faces a difficult legal decision.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep4
programme.desc: No Man Left Behind - Tensions rise when Franks' estranged older brother, Mason (guest star Philip Winchester), blows into town, desperate for help after hitting rock bottom. The team investigates the robbery of a Navy bank while Lala makes a decision about her future.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.title: KING KONG
programme.desc: Oscar winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.desc: Into Thin Air - After a Marine's wife is kidnapped for ransom, the NCIS team uncovers dark secrets as they race to track down her abductor before it's too late. Meanwhile, Sam seeks Ernie's expertise decrypting a computer program that may have deadly ramifications.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Everlasting - The officers of 15 Division work to track down Ted McDonald. But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Open Windows - A month after the evidence room bombing, Andy and Sam return from a much-needed vacation ready to work. programme.title: I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER
programme.desc: When five friends inadvertently cause a deadly car accident, they cover up their involvement and make a pact to keep it a secret rather than face the consequences. A year later, their past comes back to haunt them and they're forced to confront a horrifying truth: someone knows what they did last summer...and is hell-bent on revenge. As one by one the friends are stalked by a killer, they discover this has happened before, and they turn to two survivors of the legendary Southport Massacre of 1997 for help.

programme.title: Married... With Children S5 Ep24
programme.desc: Route 666: Part 2 - The California Coast will have to wait when, stranded in a ghost town, the Bundys and the D'Arcys catch "gold fever" and become wary mining partners.

programme.title: Wonder Woman S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - Wonder Woman travels to America disguised as Diana Prince, assistant to Major Steve Trevor. Using her golden belt, bullet-deflecting bracelets, a golden lasso and an invisible supersonic plane, Wonder Woman combats evil.

programme.desc: 4x4 - One night, four cases. Grissom and Brass get a stolen hummer and a taco stand. Warrick gets a dead car show girl. Sara and Greg get a dead bodybuilder. Nick gets a dead boy found on a bench.

programme.desc: Buck the Stud - Buck the Dog has romantic designs on every bitch in the neighborhood, but dashes Peg & Al's hopes of becoming wealthy breeders when he refuses to court a pampered pedigree.

programme.title: Frasier S3 Ep1
programme.desc: She's The Boss - When Frasier refuses to change his show to suit his new female boss, she banishes him to the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Wonder Woman S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wonder Woman Meets Baroness Von Gunther - Steve is framed for charges of treason by Nazi spies and Wonder Woman finds herself in trouble when she loses her magic lasso while trying to rescue him.

programme.desc: The 1960s (Part 2) - Malcolm's death prompts Alex to return home to discover his own "roots" and launches a twelve-year search, which culminates with his visit to a small African village.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation S5 Ep20
programme.desc: Hollywood Brass - Brass travels to Hollywood, California to try to track down his estranged daughter's friend, meanwhile trying to rekindle some kind of relationship with her.

programme.desc: I Don't Remember Mama - As Mother's Day approaches, Fran learns about Maxwell's habit of distracting the children to keep them from thinking about their own mother's death. So, in his latest ploy, Maxwell takes Fran and the kids to look over the exclusive country club he has just joined.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 Ep23
programme.desc: The Playwright - While working on a science project together, Brighton does his best to keep from agreeing to take an unpopular classmate to the upcoming seventh grade school dance.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 Ep24
programme.desc: A Star Is Unborn - Despite C.C.'s enthusiasm about the project, Maxwell declines to work with avant-garde director Phillipe Cohen on his new version of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet", one in which the star-crossed lovers are followed to heaven for a happy ending to their tragic romance.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S4 Ep1
programme.desc: U.F. Ohhh! Jeannie! - Tony and Roger land an experimental plane resembling a flying saucer in a field and are taken for Martians by a family of hillbillies.

programme.desc: Jeannie and The Wild Pipchicks - Jeannie's mother sends some homemade candy called Pipchicks. Tony eats one and has the strength of ten men. Jeannie explains it will soon wear off.

With new friends such as Gunslinger and Last Samurai, both of whom are cat lovers, she found herself in a certain base, but it was destroyed by a sudden attack of cute cats. What was the destination they arrived at after narrowly escaping with their lives?

programme.desc: Transformeows - With the help of her ability, Tsutsumi sensed that cats were closing in on Wendelstein. The people of the fort get ready to take all possible measures under Granma's command. However, what appeared were lions, elephants, gorillas, and all manner of other creatures, as well as a horde of cute cats on top of them. Everyone is speechless at the sight of this apocalyptic scene, and the fort faces its greatest crisis.

programme.title: WIND BREAKER S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Fight To Win - During the fight against Togame, Sakura is baffled by a feeling that is not just the thrill of facing a strong opponent.

programme.title: THE RED RANGER BECOMES AN ADVENTURER IN ANOTHER WORLD S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Red Ranger And The Sun Forest - The party arrives at the Sun Forest, the sacred abode of the ancient elves, only to be met with immediate danger.

programme.title: THE RED RANGER BECOMES AN ADVENTURER IN ANOTHER WORLD S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Red Ranger And Bondkiller - As Raniya laments over having to confront Azir, who was once her close friend, Togo reminisces about his past.

programme.title: THE RED RANGER BECOMES AN ADVENTURER IN ANOTHER WORLD S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Red Ranger And The Mental Mask - Azir finally begins his invasion of the Sun Forest. Will Togo and Raniya be able to stand their ground against him?

programme.title: HAIKYU!! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Formidable Ally - Shoyo and Tobio take on their teammates, in a match that will determine if they will be allowed to join the team.

programme.title: HAIKYU!! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The View From The Summit - After realizing that their old tactics are not working, Shoyo and Tobio start to work together on a winning strategy.

programme.title: HAIKYU!! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Cowards Anxiety - Both Shoyo and Tobio make it to the Karasuno volleyball team, just in time for a big practice game. But there is a catch.

programme.title: HAIKYU!! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: An Interesting Team - Tobio encounters his old teammate while playing against Aoba Josai High, and he vows to win after being taunted.

programme.title: HAIKYU!! S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Versus The Great King - Karasuno wins the game against Aoba Josai High. Tobio's ex-teammate feels that Tobio has changed since middle school.

programme.title: THE FOOLISH ANGEL DANCES WITH THE DEVIL S1 Ep9
programme.desc: No Absolutes - Liliya, Lily's clone, attends school as her stand-in, teasing Akutsu before calling him out at lunch.

programme.title: THE FOOLISH ANGEL DANCES WITH THE DEVIL S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Dignity - Lily's brother, Zwei, appears. Sensing Lily's uneasy smile, Akutsu followsonly to find her trembling as Zwei points a saber at her!?

programme.title: THE FOOLISH ANGEL DANCES WITH THE DEVIL S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Thanks - Lily weeps after Zwei's attack. Enraged, Akutsu awakens his demonic power, crushing Zweibut in his fury, he even turns against Lily!?

programme.title: THE FOOLISH ANGEL DANCES WITH THE DEVIL S1 Ep12
programme.desc: To You. - At his apartment, Liliya confronts Akutsu for ruining her life. Meanwhile, Lily wakes up in his bed, misunderstands, and attacks him.

programme.title: NYAIGHT OF THE LIVING CAT S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Norwegian D'arc - In the midst of the nyandemic, Tsutsumi left Kaoru and her friends and fled to a shelter, where she later became a hero in various places thanks to her super cat-sensing ability. With new friends such as Gunslinger and Last Samurai, both of whom are cat lovers, she found herself in a certain base, but it was destroyed by a sudden attack of cute cats. What was the destination they arrived at after narrowly escaping with their lives?

programme.title: NYAIGHT OF THE LIVING CAT S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Transformeows - With the help of her ability, Tsutsumi sensed that cats were closing in on Wendelstein. The people of the fort get ready to take all possible measures under Granma's command. However, what appeared were lions, elephants, gorillas, and all manner of other creatures, as well as a horde of cute cats on top of them. Everyone is speechless at the sight of this apocalyptic scene, and the fort faces its greatest crisis.

programme.title: NYAIGHT OF THE LIVING CAT S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Meow Am Legend - One after another, the residents of the base are transformed into cute cats. Kunagi loses consciousness due to Suo's betrayal. Just when the fort was about to fall, the meow of a cat echoed through Wendelstein. It was the final move by Granma with the help of Jones. Granma attempts to save the day through an interspecies cat meeting.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Joel Dommett hosts as the remaining six incognito celebrities enter the competition, with Pufferfish, Bush, Wolf, Pegasus, Toad in the Hole and Bear taking to the stage. Special guest Vicky McClure joins the panellists.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6 Ep3
programme.desc: The musical guessing game continues as Joel Dommett welcomes five of the incognito celebrity singers back to the stage. Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Maya Jama, Mo Gilligan and guest panellist Suranne Jones try to work out who they are.

programme.title: The Good Fight S5 Ep1
programme.desc: Diane has to decide on the firm's future, after losing two leading lawyers.

programme.title: The Good Fight S5 Ep2
programme.desc: New associates come to the office, including Marissa and Carmen. Marissa finds herself in an improvised court.

programme.title: The Good Fight S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Liz represents a bicycle shop in a libel case. Marissa receives an interesting offer. A questionable client comes to the firm, asking for Carmen to represent him.

programme.title: The Good Fight S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Carmen gets a tip from a client with regard to Diane and Kurt. Marissa finds that Judge Wackner has an investor. The firm is requested to run a sensitivity read on a stand-up comic's materials.

programme.title: The Wrong Daughter
programme.desc: Kate and Joe are considering in-vitro options when a child Kate gave up 17 years ago resurfaces. Danica moves in with Kate and as time passes, cracks begin to appear, is she really Kate's daughter?

programme.title: 10,000 Days
programme.desc: It's 10,000 days in the future... Earth is locked in a new Ice Age, and the survivors of this cataclysmic shift must engage in an epic struggle of life or death.

programme.desc: Scientist Steve Thomas must risk his reputation, career, and life in order to save mankind from a huge asteroid headed straight for Earth

programme.desc: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

programme.title: World's Most Amazing Walks with Robson Green S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hadrian's Wall - Robson Green sets out on one of the most iconic walks in the UK, the Hadrian's Wall path. For Robson, who was born and raised in the North East, it's a deeply personal and emotional journey.

programme.title: Planet Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Freshwater - In an epic river journey following the descent of the planet's mightiest rivers from their mountain sources to the sea, this episode features swimming monkeys, giant salamanders and Amazonian river dolphins.

programme.title: Solar System S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice Worlds - Professor Brian Cox explores the solar system's ice giants, frozen moons and worlds where ice behaves in unimaginable ways.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 7 - In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Get on board with a cool use for a Boeing 747's wings, which are now the roof of a California house, and step inside a theatre that rose like a phoenix from Industrial Revolution ashes.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Sterling K Brown - Actor Sterling K. Brown joins Bear in the high mountains of Colorado, where they battle plummeting temperatures while descending a sheer rock face, track an elusive deer and rappel down a waterfall.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Deadly 60 S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Bat Spectacular - Steve Backshall is in Zambia to witness ten million fruit bats undertake the world's largest aerial migration. However, these bats are a buffet for Africa's top three eagles.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Art Of Tea - Tea ceremonies of the past inform present day rituals - including a breath-taking outdoor tea ceremony for 100 people on the banks of a river in Taiwan. The skills and passion of the world famous Rock Tea producers are celebrated in a blind-tasting competition.

programme.desc: Series 6, Episode 5 - Record-breaking Hurricane Otis devastates holiday hotspot Acapulco on Mexico's coast.

programme.desc: Bat Spectacular - Steve Backshall is in Zambia to witness ten million fruit bats undertake the world's largest aerial migration. However, these bats are a buffet for Africa's top three eagles.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Art Of Tea - Tea ceremonies of the past inform present day rituals - including a breath-taking outdoor tea ceremony for 100 people on the banks of a river in Taiwan. The skills and passion of the world famous Rock Tea producers are celebrated in a blind-tasting competition.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S6 Ep5
programme.desc: Series 6, Episode 5 - Record-breaking Hurricane Otis devastates holiday hotspot Acapulco on Mexico's coast.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy city's annual procession.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazar in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.desc: Trainers - Hannah discovers how American breakfast waffles transformed our trainer soles, and how a family feud created two of the world's biggest trainer brands.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ice and Fire - Scandinavia's extremes have been shaped by ice and fire, but it's the sun that reigns here. Polar bears, musk oxen and arctic foxes must survive from the polar night to the midnight sun.

programme.title: Solar System S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice Worlds - Professor Brian Cox explores the solar system's ice giants, frozen moons and worlds where ice behaves in unimaginable ways.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Trainers - Hannah discovers how American breakfast waffles transformed our trainer soles, and how a family feud created two of the world's biggest trainer brands.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa's most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Chasing Scales - Storm into a new suburb, where the wranglers keep deadly snakes from slipping into family homes. Watch as Stu and Liv pull an eastern brown from a job site, Jess and Dan expel a python from a shed, and Mick and Adele evict a red belly from a bedroom.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Home Invasion - Respond to danger on a rural property with Mick and Adele, who brave a fired-up brown snake. Tread carefully as Jess and Dan extract a python from a play area, and get spooked when a chicken-hunting python squashes Liv's hand during a tense rescue.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo - Embrace an invasive nutria who's become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmer's bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand there's plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Guardians Of The Wild S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Carnivore Rescue - Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africa's apex predators.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep5

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Home Invasion - Respond to danger on a rural property with Mick and Adele, who brave a fired-up brown snake. Tread carefully as Jess and Dan extract a python from a play area, and get spooked when a chicken-hunting python squashes Liv's hand during a tense rescue.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Weka's pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predjama - Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Alhambra - Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region's wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Neuschwanstein - Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: Animals At Play S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals At Play S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rules of the Game - Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists' cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bandit, Max, and George - Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger, and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils' softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Toto, Banksi, and Lucy - Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pig's rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Penny, Chunk, and Faith - Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo - Embrace an invasive nutria who's become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmer's bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: How The Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Becoming Elephant: the Orphans of Reteti S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Steps - Explore community-run Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, where human surrogate moms offer survival lessons and nurture young elephants through play. Bond with trunkless Long'uro and see why six-year-old Kelele's mysterious illness could delay his release.

programme.title: Becoming Elephant: the Orphans of Reteti S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Back to the Wild - Balance the pain of goodbyes with hope for the future as a generation of rescued elephants are finally released. Welcome new additions to the Reteti family, including a baby elephant rescued from a watering hole and a traumatized zebra named Kisima.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary's orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla's fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: How The Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.desc: First Steps - Explore community-run Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, where human surrogate moms offer survival lessons and nurture young elephants through play. Bond with trunkless Long'uro and see why six-year-old Kelele's mysterious illness could delay his release.

programme.desc: Back to the Wild - Balance the pain of goodbyes with hope for the future as a generation of rescued elephants are finally released. Welcome new additions to the Reteti family, including a baby elephant rescued from a watering hole and a traumatized zebra named Kisima.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary's orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla's fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Hummingbirds Quest - From Colombia's high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Warriors of the Llanos - The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She's about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo's calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Over Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arid Heart - From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia's most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba pride's nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as he's saved from snapping jaws and cements the family's future.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Winter is Coming - As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it's warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meadow of Horror - It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it - you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow - but full of monsters.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee's Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Insect Apocalypse - Look at what a global insect decline could do to our planet. Uncover our historical dependence on these tiny animals, the vital roles they play in our ecosystems, and the reasons why our fragile relationship to them is in danger worldwide.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moth's clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Eat Or Be Eaten - Go up against predatory insects that are tailor-made for killing. See why the terrifying praying mantis has the agility of a martial artist and an appetite for everything from flies to hummingbirds, then go hunting in mid-air with deadly dragonflies.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beetle Mania - Get a sanitation lesson from nature's original cleanup crew. Learn how beetles keep ecosystems in balance with clever biological weapons like tusks and toxic sprays, then see why the 6,000-plus species of dung beetles are the world's unsung heroes.
