programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Missing Marcus , The Baby-Glitters Club - When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a family fairy means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House , To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs , I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep72
programme.desc: Ruff Transition - A baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut forcing her to become a Wingmaiden but when she doesnt have the maternal instincts she must figure out how to protect the baby dragon when the Flyers attack

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Lutheras Shield - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Battle of Tianshang Part 2 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 Ep63
programme.desc: The Neighs Have It - The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 Ep64
programme.desc: A Rider's Balance - After meeting her riding idols, Pru vows to practice until she's perfect even if it means missing out on a bonfire her best friends are planning.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 Ep65
programme.desc: Welcome Back Otter - Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer , Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear, Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep56
programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Becoming Part 2 - Jim warms up to the idea of being the Trollhunter until he faces Bular, who is determined to destroy him, so he seeks help in Blinky and AAARRRGGHH!!

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wherefore Art Thou Trollhunter? - Jim is not welcomed by the Trolls as their new Trollhunter, and he suffers a humiliating defeat at the hands of Draal

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Gnome Your Enemy - Jim undertakes his first Trollhunting mission by starting small: he must shrink down to eight inches tall to apprehend a mischievous gnome.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they're so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Heather Report Part II - Hiccup and the gang infiltrate the outsiders in order to free Heather's parents.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S3 Ep63
programme.desc: Trial by Fire - The Paladins struggle to escape after Sendak captures them, their lions, and Admiral Sanda

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! S2 Ep37
programme.desc: A Tale of Three Kiddies , Austland City Limits - In honor of #ThrowbackThursday, each Harvey Girl shares a story from her past. Gerald takes the gang to visit his hometown.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged S3 Ep63
programme.desc: Magnodozer - Dozer is put to the test in order to clear a path through Cave In Canyon when he gets hit by a magnetic surprise.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Three - Bullwinkle and Rocky fly to a mysterious monster-inhabited island to meet the missing mad scientist that created the serum that turned Bullwinkle into a monster, only to learn of the biggest, meanest monster on the island, Humongalon

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Reflesherator , Master Blister - The Reflesherator When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. Master Blister The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Casper The Match Maker , Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher - Casper, the Match Maker When Frankengymteacher gets extra crabby, the kids realize he's secretly in love with their history teacher, Hedy. Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher On take your kid to work day, Jimmy's dad invites him to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread,the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful,but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin's jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedian's disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep5

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep413
programme.desc: Side-Swiped / Quest for the Blue Bananas - Dora and Boots run into Swiper and his nephew Zorrito! They must make it home before Swiper and Zorrito can swipe their teddy bear. Dora meets Boots' cousin, Sombrera, and they journey across the rainforest to find the special blue bananas!

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep308
programme.desc: The Bunny Boyz - Dora and Boots help the Bunny Boyz boy band get super clean and sparkly before their big show!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Rocket Race / Magic / Parents - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep80
programme.desc: Fast Slow Fast Slow - The Teletubbies take it in turns to go up and down on the Dup Dup. Sometimes they go fast and sometimes they go slow - even The Noo-noo has a turn!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep20
programme.desc: T - Dee encourages a friend to say 't', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet a turtle, shake our tails and see a tiger in a tall tent!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Messy's Mega Power - The Oki-dokis are about to perform when OKIDO runs out of electricity! Anxious that their favourite band might not be able to play, can Messy and his friends find a new way of powering the concert?

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Be Brave Bryan - Bryan gets spooked and thinks there's a lake monster lurking in the mists. It'll be Mojo and Bo who have to find the monster... or show Bryan that there's no monster at all!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Ragdoll - Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep15
programme.desc: The Love Badge - When Duggee gets a card from someone he loves, the Squirrels ask: does he still love them? In a show-stopping song, Delivery Chipmunk shows them the answer is a resounding YES.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep14
programme.desc: The Shopping Badge - Duggee loves to shop local, so the Big Shop is a Big Deal for him. He's over-excited and wants two of everything. The Squirrels have to remind him 'we only popped in for milk!'

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Avenue of the Baobabs, Madagascar - GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Pirates - It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Barky Boats - Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain, when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Andy and the Swift Fox Pups - Andy and Jen are sent to North America to check on a swift fox mum who has been left to bring up four cubs on her own.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Mission: Ringy Thing - Rayane takes a starring role in the big drama club play, with Diesel right by his side.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Sea Anemone and Pitcher Plant - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a sea anemone to see how it feeds underwater. Next, they meet a pitcher plant and discover the extraordinary wild connection they share.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mud - Bella and Lift visit the Cloud Kitchen, where Patch is busy with the Playtimers making a tasty treat called Munchy Muddy Meadows.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep44
programme.desc: The Board Game Badge - It is a rainy day in the clubhouse which means it's a perfect day for a board game.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep43
programme.desc: The Soap Opera Badge - The Squirrels accidentally break the Chickens' TV aerial!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep42
programme.desc: The Mythical Creature Badge - The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Great Wall of China, China - Glitch and his grimbots have a long race on a very long wall - the Great Wall of China!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Chichen Itza, Mexico - Grandmaster Glitch's giant ball game threatens El Castillo in Chichen Itza, Mexico, so the Go Jetters attempt to save it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep16
programme.desc: Kenji on the Rails Again - When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide. So, Thomas sets out to find him

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Lemon Cafe - Sarah & Duck discover a Lemon Cafe in the park, but it seems to be nearly closing time...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Woolly Memories - Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Sofa - Stanley has to fix Myrtles wobbly sofa so her and her friends can watch Fred and Fifi on the Boogie Woogie Dance Show together. He ends up creating a super-duper special sofa.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Holiday - Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Get It Wrong To Get It Right - Monty is sad when he messes up his paper plane creation, but Gran teaches him that a person can learn from their mistakes.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep14
programme.desc: It's Time to Play Basketball - JoJo and Gran Gran run into Jared and Cynthia who are playing basketball. JoJo joins in, but she doesn't feel like she is tall enough to play it well.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Hong Kong, China - The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Brussels Sprout - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's tiny Brussels Sprout performing I'm Mighty and proving how great he is.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Tomato - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, Tomato changes colour.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Broccoli Alone - Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Pea Repeats - Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Dua Sisi
programme.desc: Dua Sisi ialah sebuah rancangan bual bicara dan debat berprestij yang menggabungkan tiga elemen utama dalam satu program: perdebatan intelektual, wacana bersama tokoh elit, dan sokongan kepada komuniti usahawan. Diterajui oleh pendekatan eksklusif dan gaya penyampaian yang intelek, rancangan ini menampilkan tokoh-tokoh berpengaruh, pendebat cemerlang, dan pemilik perniagaan dalam satu pentas yang sama membicarakan isu-isu semasa dari dua sisi pandang.

programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1004
programme.desc: Ultimate Knockouts 30 Years of Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you the best knockouts in the UFC's 30-year history.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC320AnkalaevvsPereira
programme.desc: UFC 320 Countdown previews two title fights. In the main event, Magomed Ankalaev battles Alex Pereira in a rematch for the light heavyweight crown. In the co-main event, Merab Dvalishvili puts his bantamweight belt on the line against Cory Sandhagen

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC 322: Della Maddalena vs. Makhachev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC superstars will dare to be great at New York Citys Madison Square Garden on November 16, as VeChain UFC 322 presents a championship doubleheader for the ages. In the main event, longtime lightweight champion Islam Makhachev makes his highly anticipated move to 170 pounds to challenge for Jack Della Maddalenas welterweight title. Plus, Chinas Zhang Weili has proven to be perhaps the greatest strawweight of all-time, but this November, she will face the sports greatest flyweight, Valentina Shevchenko, for the 125-pound crown in a long-awaited Super Fight
